Package edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.service

Class PostService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.service.PostService
  • @Service
public class PostService
extends java.lang.Object
    A Service class for the Post entity that participates in dependency injection, and performs more detailed methods for obtaining information for the PostController and PostRepository.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PostService​(PostRepository postRepository, StorageService storageService)
      Creates an instance of PostRepository
